get.description:
Output the indicated catalog. Catalogs are only available for retrieval when their associated status request
is at a Success status.
Produces application/x-json-stream of v2021_07 CatalogProduct json objects.

parameters.name: catalogId
parameters.description: A catalog ID returned from an account catalog request.

400.description: The indicated catalog is not available for retrieval, wait for a success status.

ApplicationSummaryModelResource.description: A class that represents a ValueType in a guild compliant way

traceIdentifier.description: The request correlation ID this problem comes from.

code.description: A machine-readable  error code, expressed as a string value.

instance.description: A URI that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.

title.description: A short human-readable description of the problem type

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

source.description: A machine-readable structure to reference to the exact location(s) causing the error(s)

CommonProblem.description: Common problem object. Can be specialized as needed.

access_token.description: The access token issued by the authorization server.

token_type.description: The type of the token issued.

refresh_token.description: The refresh token issued by the authorization server.

expires_in.description: The lifetime in seconds of the access token.For example, the value "3600" denotes that the access token will expire in one hour from the time the response was generated. If omitted, the authorization server SHOULD provide the expiration time via other means or document the default value.

AccessTokenModel.description: Access Token to be used with other services

JsonApiPageResponseOfAccount.description: A wrapper class to return a single page of <typeparamref name="T" /> with metadata

JsonApiPageResponseOfBrand.description: A wrapper class to return a single page of <typeparamref name="T" /> with metadata

PageMetadata.description: Metadata related to the current request

traceId.description: (REQUIRED) The Correlation ID provided by the Gateway. It is also a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

code.description: (REQUIRED) A machine-readable unique error code, expressed as a string value. The format used must be kabab-case.

instance.description: (REQUIRED) A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.

title.description: (RECOMMENDED) A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

detail.description: (RECOMMENDED) A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

source.description: (OPTIONAL) A machine-readable structure to reference to the exact location(s) causing the error(s)

stackTrace.description: (NEVER IN PRODUCTION) A human-readable stacktrace produced by the implementation technology

ExternalAccount.description: A Retail Media Account used to launch campaigns and line items

ExternalRetailer.description: A Retail Media Retailer used to represent a selection of products from multiple brands

ExternalBrand.description: A Retail Media Brand used to represent a collection of products sold under the same umbrella name

A JSON:API wrapper class to format a <typeparamref name="TAttributes" /> with external Id, Type, and
Attributes properties

A JSON:API wrapper class to format a <typeparamref name="TAttributes" /> with Type, and
Attributes properties

status.description: An enumeration of the status of the catalog.

currency.description: An ISO4217 representation of the currency products are listed under in this catalog.

rowCount.description:
An indication of the number of products contained in this catalog. Available when
this catalog reaches a success status.

fileSizeBytes.description: The size of this catalog in bytes. Available when this catalog reaches a success status.

md5Checksum.description:
An MD5 checksum of the catalog for use in confirming complete and uncorrupted retrieval.
Available when this catalog reaches a success status.

createdAt.description: The time this catalog was created. Represented as a UTC ISO8601 string.

message.description: An optional information message intended for developer consumption.

ExternalCatalogStatus.description: The status of an asynchronous request to generate a catalog

ExternalCatalogRequest.description: A request for a catalog under the specified format. Currently "json-newline" is supported.

ExternalCampaign.description: A Retail Media Campaign used to represent an advertiser's marketing objective

startDate.description: Represents the Date as a year, month, and day in the format YYYY-MM-DD

endDate.description: Represents the Date as a year, month, and day in the format YYYY-MM-DD

startDate.description: Represents the Date as a year, month, and day in the format YYYY-MM-DD

endDate.description: Represents the Date as a year, month, and day in the format YYYY-MM-DD

startDate.description: Represents the Date as a year, month, and day in the format YYYY-MM-DD

endDate.description: Represents the Date as a year, month, and day in the format YYYY-MM-DD

code.description: (REQUIRED) A machine-readable unique error code, expressed as a string value. The format used must be kabab-case.

detail.description: (RECOMMENDED) A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: (REQUIRED) A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.

stackTrace.description: (NEVER IN PRODUCTION) A human-readable stacktrace produced by the implementation technology e.g. .Net, Scala, etc

title.description: (RECOMMENDED) A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

traceId.description: (REQUIRED) The Correlation ID provided by the Gateway. It is also a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the report started to execute

expiresAt.description: Timestamp when the cached report will expire

fileSizeBytes.description: Total size of file, only populated on success

md5Checksum.description: The MD5 checksum of the content, only populated on success

message.description: Failure message, only populated on failure

rowCount.description: Rows of data in report, only populated on success

MapString.description: (OPTIONAL) A machine-readable structure to reference to the exact location(s) causing the error(s).

clickAttributionWindow.description: Defaults to value from campaign or one of "7D", "14D", or "30D". If specified, viewAttributionWindow must also be specified

endDate.description: YYYY-MM-DD, must not be before startDate and not more than 100 days later

id.description: The id of the campaign or line item.  Either 'id' or 'ids' must be specified, but not both

ids.description: The ids of the campaigns or line items.  Either 'id' or 'ids' must be specified, but not both

viewAttributionWindow.description: Defaults to value from campaign or one of "none", "1D", "7D", "14D", or "30D". If specified, must be less than clickAttributionWindow, which must also be specified.
